pages.index: PlayRoomOasis Home Games About Birthday Parties Contact FAQ What is PlayRoomOasis? Welcome to PlayRoomOasis, where kids can explore, learn, and have fun in a safe and nurturing environment. Our mission is to provide a stimulating and imaginative space where children can engage in creative play, develop new skills, and make lasting memories. At PlayRoomOasis, we offer a variety of interactive play areas, educational activities, and exciting events designed to cater to children of all ages. Whether it's a birthday party, a playdate with friends, or a fun-filled day out with the family, there's always something exciting happening at PlayRoomOasis! Book Now Promotions Summer Fun Sale Get ready for a summer of fun with our exclusive Summer Fun Sale! Enjoy discounts on admission tickets, party packages, and more. Don't miss out on the hottest deals of the season! Family Fun Day Join us for a day of family fun! Enjoy special discounts on family passes, complimentary snacks, and exciting activities for all ages. Create lasting memories with your loved ones at PlayRoomOasis! Holiday Extravaganza Celebrate the holiday season with our Holiday Extravaganza! Enjoy festive activities, themed parties, and special surprises throughout the month of December. Spread the holiday cheer at PlayRoomOasis! Our Games Simulator Shooting Experience the thrill of realistic shooting simulations in Simulator Shooting. Test your aim and reflexes as you engage in various target practice scenarios, from classic marksmanship challenges to dynamic shooting galleries. Button Battle Engage in frantic button-mashing battles in Button Battle. Compete against friends or AI opponents in fast-paced multiplayer showdowns where speed and agility are key to victory. Arcade Machines Step back in time and relive the nostalgia of classic arcade gaming in Arcade Machines. Discover a variety of retro arcade cabinets featuring timeless favorites like Pac-Man, Space Invaders, and Street Fighter. Subway Surfers Arcade Join the high-speed adventure of Subway Surfers Arcade. Dash through bustling city streets, dodge oncoming trains, and collect coins in this endless runner game that will keep you on the edge of your seat. VR Zone Immerse yourself in the world of virtual reality in VR Zone. Explore breathtaking landscapes, engage in thrilling adventures, and experience gaming like never before with cutting-edge VR technology. PlayStation 5 Zone Discover the latest and greatest gaming experiences in PlayStation 5 Zone. Dive into a vast library of games, from blockbuster titles to indie gems, and enjoy unparalleled graphics and performance on Sony's next-gen console. Pinball Experience the excitement of arcade pinball in Pinball. Launch the ball, hit targets, and activate special features as you compete for the highest score in this timeless classic. Foosball Challenge your friends to intense foosball matches in Foosball. Master the art of precision passing and lightning-fast reflexes as you battle it out on the tabletop soccer field. Photo Booth Capture unforgettable memories with friends and family in the Photo Booth. Strike a pose, choose fun props, and take home a souvenir photo strip to remember your visit. Party Room Celebrate special occasions in style in the Party Room. Whether it's a birthday bash, a corporate event, or a family reunion, our customizable party packages are sure to make your event unforgettable. Laser Maze Test your agility and problem-solving skills in the Laser Maze. Navigate through a web of lasers, avoid detection, and reach the other side without tripping the alarms in this thrilling challenge. Mirror Maze Get lost in a labyrinth of mirrors in the Mirror Maze. Navigate through twisting corridors, evade dead ends, and find your way out in this mind-bending maze of reflections. Carnival Games Step right up and test your skills in Carnival Games. Try your luck at classic fairground attractions like ring toss, balloon darts, and shooting galleries to win exciting prizes. Escape Room Challenge Put your wits to the test in the Escape Room Challenge. Work together with your team to solve puzzles, unravel mysteries, and escape before time runs out in this immersive adventure. Dance Revolution Get ready to move and groove in Dance Revolution. Bust out your best dance moves, follow the rhythm, and compete for high scores as you dance to the beat of your favorite tunes. Ninja Warrior Course Challenge your agility and strength in the Ninja Warrior Course. Navigate through obstacles, conquer climbing walls, and complete the ultimate test of endurance in this adrenaline-fueled challenge. Virtual Roller Coaster Experience the thrill of riding roller coasters from the comfort of VR in Virtual Roller Coaster. Strap in, hold on tight, and get ready for heart-pounding drops and exhilarating loops in this virtual theme park adventure. Trivia Night Put your knowledge to the test in Trivia Night. Gather your friends, answer challenging questions across various categories, and compete for bragging rights as the ultimate trivia champion. About Us At PlayRoomOasis, we are passionate about creating unforgettable experiences for children and families. Established in 2020, we have been dedicated to providing a safe and dynamic environment where kids can learn, explore, and play to their heart's content. Our state-of-the-art facilities boast a wide range of interactive games, educational workshops, and themed play areas designed to spark creativity and imagination in children of all ages. From thrilling adventure zones to cozy reading corners, there's something for everyone at PlayRoomOasis. But we're more than just a play center – we're a community hub where families come together to connect, create, and make memories that last a lifetime. Our team of friendly and experienced staff is committed to ensuring that every visit is enjoyable, educational, and above all, fun! At PlayRoomOasis, we believe in the power of play to inspire, educate, and entertain. Whether it's a birthday party, a school field trip, or a weekend outing with the family, we're here to make every moment special. Join us and let your imagination run wild! Come and discover the magic of PlayRoomOasis – where adventure awaits around every corner and the possibilities are endless. Upcoming Events Kids Art Workshop Let your child's creativity shine at our Kids Art Workshop! They'll explore various art techniques and create their own masterpieces under the guidance of our talented instructors. Day: Monday Time: 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM Family Movie Night Join us for a magical evening at our Family Movie Night! Grab your blankets and snacks and enjoy a heartwarming movie under the stars with your loved ones. Day: Friday Time: 7:00 PM - 9:00 PM Story Time Immerse yourself in the magic of storytelling at our Story Time event! Join us for captivating tales, interactive activities, and special guest appearances that will spark your child's imagination. Day: Saturday Time: 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM Birthday Parties Classic Celebration Celebrate your child's special day with our Classic Celebration package! Enjoy exclusive use of our party room, a dedicated party host, themed decorations, and fun activities for all guests. Package includes: 2 hours of party time Themed invitations Party favors for all guests Customizable birthday cake Interactive games and activities And more! Book Now Ultimate Adventure Take your child's birthday party to the next level with our Ultimate Adventure package! Enjoy all the perks of the Classic Celebration, plus additional upgrades such as a bounce house, face painting, and a magic show. Package includes: All features of the Classic Celebration Bounce house rental Face painting station Magician performance Special gift for the birthday child And more! Book Now Princess & Superhero Extravaganza Make your child's birthday dreams come true with our Princess & Superhero Extravaganza package! Let them dress up as their favorite characters and enjoy royal or heroic-themed games, activities, and crafts. Package includes: Themed costumes and accessories Princess or superhero training session Interactive storytime Photo booth with props Princess crowning or superhero oath ceremony And more! Book Now Outdoor Adventure Explore the great outdoors with our Outdoor Adventure package! Host your child's birthday party in our outdoor play area, complete with nature-themed games, scavenger hunts, and a picnic lunch. Package includes: Exclusive use of outdoor play area Nature-themed games and activities Scavenger hunt with prizes Picnic lunch with snacks and refreshments Outdoor storytelling session And more! Book Now Testimonials Emily Smith "My kids absolutely love PlayRoomOasis! The staff is friendly, the facilities are clean, and there's always something fun happening. Highly recommended!" John Doe "We hosted my daughter's birthday party at PlayRoomOasis, and it was a hit! The party package was affordable, and the kids had a blast. Thank you for making her day special!" Sarah Johnson "As a parent, I appreciate the emphasis on safety at PlayRoomOasis. I feel confident leaving my kids in the care of the staff knowing that they prioritize the well-being of the children." Amy Wilson "PlayRoomOasis exceeded my expectations! The variety of activities kept my kids entertained for hours. We'll definitely be coming back for more fun!" Michael Brown "I've been bringing my children to PlayRoomOasis for years, and it never disappoints. The staff is attentive, the facilities are clean, and the kids always have a great time." Emma Davis "I recently attended a party at PlayRoomOasis, and it was fantastic! The party hosts were engaging, the activities were fun, and the overall atmosphere was lively. Highly recommended for any celebration!" Contact Us Phone: +916467103146 Email: PlayRoomOasis@gmail.com Address: KirtiStambh Circle, Palace Street, Vadodara, Gujarat 390001, India I accept Privacy Policy Send Opening Hours Monday 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM Tuesday 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM Wednesday 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM Thursday 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM Friday 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM Saturday 10:00 AM - 9:00 PM Sunday 10:00 AM - 9:00 PM Frequently Asked Questions How do I book a session? To book a session, simply visit our website and go to the booking section. Select your desired date and time, fill out the required information, and complete the payment process. Are outside food and drinks allowed? Outside food and drinks are not allowed in our facility. However, we have a café on-site where you can purchase snacks and beverages. What age groups is PlayRoomOasis suitable for? PlayRoomOasis is suitable for children of all ages, from toddlers to teenagers. We offer a variety of activities and games tailored to different age groups. Do you offer birthday party packages? Yes, we offer birthday party packages for children of all ages. Our packages include exclusive use of our party room, themed decorations, activities, and more. Contact us for more information! Is there a dress code for children? There is no specific dress code for children, but we recommend wearing comfortable clothing and closed-toe shoes for safety reasons. Do you have parking available? Yes, we have ample parking available for our guests. Our parking lot is located conveniently close to the entrance. Home Games About Birthday Parties Contact FAQ Privacy Policy Terms & Condition
pages.policy: Privacy Policy | PlayRoomOasis main { padding: 50px 0; } p { margin-bottom: 20px; } h1 { margin-bottom: 40px; } h2{ margin-bottom: 20px; } a{ color: #1da552; } a:hover{ text-decoration: underline; } Home Games About Birthday Parties Contact FAQ Privacy Policy Children's Privacy Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13. If You are a parent or guardian and You are aware that Your child has provided Us with Personal Data, please contact Us. If We become aware that We have collected Personal Data from anyone under the age of 13 without verification of parental consent, We take steps to remove that information from Our servers. If We need to rely on consent as a legal basis for processing Your information and Your country requires consent from a parent, We may require Your parent's consent before We collect and use that information. Links to Other Websites Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Us. If You click on a third party link, You will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise You to review the Privacy Policy of every site You visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify You of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. We will let You know via email and/or a prominent notice on Our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us: Phone: +916467103146 Email: PlayRoomOasis@gmail.com Location: KirtiStambh Circle, Palace Street, Vadodara, Gujarat 390001, India Home Games About Birthday Parties Contact FAQ Privacy Policy Terms & Condition
pages.terms: PlayRoomOasis | Terms & Condition main { padding: 50px 0; } p { margin-bottom: 20px; } h1 { margin-bottom: 40px; } h2 { margin-bottom: 20px; } a{ color: #1da552; } a:hover{ text-decoration: underline; } Home Games About Birthday Parties Contact FAQ Terms and Conditions Acknowledgment These are the Terms and Conditions governing the use of this Service and the agreement that operates between You and the Company. pages.thanks: Thank You for Contacting Us main { max-width: 800px; margin: 20px auto; padding: 20px; border-radius: 5px; box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } p { margin-bottom: 20px; } a{ color: #1da552; } a:hover{ text-decoration: underline; } h1 { margin-bottom: 40px; } Thank You for Reaching Out! We appreciate you taking the time to connect with PlayRoomOasis. Your inquiry is important to us, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible to address any questions or requests you may have. In the meantime, feel free to explore more about our range of household chemicals and cleaning solutions on our website. We're dedicated to providing top-notch products tailored to your needs. Thank you once again for considering PlayRoomOasis for your household cleaning needs. We look forward to the opportunity to assist you further. Best regards,PlayRoomOasis Return to Home Page.
